item.title: How to Efficiently Retrieve Video Frames from MinIO using pyAV
item.description: A video is made up of frames, but retrieving a specific frame from a video file is not straight forward. What if the video file is stored remotely?

item.title: Notes on Homographies
item.description: This is writeup of some formulas that proved to be helpful understanding and working with homographies.
